trustIndicators.label: Community Focused

features.title: High Uptime
features.description: Maintaining 99.95% uptime across all networks with redundant infrastructure and monitoring.

features.title: Competitive Rewards
features.description: Maximize your staking rewards with our low 5% commission and consistent performance.

features.title: Secure Operations
features.description: Your delegated assets are protected by enterprise-grade security measures and best practices.

features.title: 24/7 Support
features.description: Get help when you need it from our experienced team of blockchain professionals.

steps.title: Connect Wallet
steps.description: Connect your Keplr or Cosmostation wallet to get started with staking.

steps.title: Choose Amount
steps.description: Select how much you want to delegate to Crxanode validator.

steps.title: Start Earning
steps.description: Confirm delegation and start earning staking rewards immediately.

team.name: Crxanode Team
